name: Ankit Chauhan
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Experienced full stack developer with 6 years of expertise in Node.js, Angular, PHP, Laravel and modern frameworks. Strong experience in building scalable enterprise applications, clean REST APIs, and business-driven solutions.

projects.name: Voltas
projects.description: Worked on multiple Voltas portals including Voltas Selfcare Portal, Voltas AMC Portal, and DMS Portal. The Selfcare Portal enables customers to raise service requests, buy AMC plans, manage profiles, and handle product-related actions. The AMC Portal allows dealers and franchise partners to sell AMC plans directly to customers. The DMS Portal manages and stores all documents and files related to various Voltas applications.

projects.name: Staff Selection Commission (SSC)
projects.description: Maintained legacy SSC systems and developed new modules using Node.js, Angular and PostgreSQL.

projects.name: MIP (Market Implementation Plan)
projects.description: Built project templates, configuration modules, multi-phase workflows and admin panels.

projects.name: V-Mart Asset Management
projects.description: Asset tracking and management system for multi-location retail operations.

education: MCA – Graphic Era Deemed To Be University (2018–2020)
